text.label: Saab JA-37Di Viggen Route Manager System
L1 is usually also the take-off base.
Interact with the routes and areas on the TI color display and the DAP.
Only .fgfp (Flightgear xml routes), .ck37 or .gpx files is supported.
Destinations from loaded RTBs, gets replaced by the base settings.
The Mission and RTB routes must max have 48 waypoints in each.
The Polygon areas must max have 8 waypoints in each.
Pilot-points (FF), bulls-eye, landing bases, anti-aircraft (LV) areas, interoperability and various other settings.
Save/load everything to a folder. Recommend saving all only to a empty folder. Loading all will clear all old data and routes.
